item.title: Trump administration planning illegal immigrant arrests throughout US on ‘day one’
item.description: The incoming Trump administration wants to start arresting illegal immigrants across the US as soon as Tuesday, amid the promise of a mass deportation...

item.title: Hegseth backed by Louisiana Sen. Bill Cassidy to lead the Pentagon under Trump
item.description: Pete Hegseth, President-elect Trump's pick to head the Department of Defense, inches closer to confirmation.

item.title: Mayor Eric Adams, President-elect Trump meet in Florida; Adams says they didn't discuss his legal case
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams met with President-elect Trump in Palm Beach, Florida, on Friday, ahead of Trump's inauguration on Monday.
